name: starf-berry
effect: Held in battle : When the holder has 1/4 its max HP remaining or less, it consumes this item to raise a random stat by two stages.
short_effect: Held: Consumed at 1/4 max HP to boost a random stat by two stages.

flavor_text.sun_moon: A Berry to be consumed by Pokémon. If a Pokémon holds one, one of its stats will sharply increase when it’s in a pinch.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: A Berry to be consumed by Pokémon. If a Pokémon holds one, one of its stats will sharply increase when it’s in a pinch.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: A Berry to be consumed by Pokémon. If a Pokémon holds one, one of its stats will sharply increase when it’s in a pinch.
